sub_title: Senior Investment Manager Long Term Equity Strategy bij PGGM Investments - Impact investing
summary: Senior investment professional with demonstrated track record in successfully analyzing companies and managing large equity portfolios (up to 5bn Euro) in an international context. Investment experience covers all regions with a strong passion for emerging markets. Long experience in evaluating corporate strategy at CEO/CFO level and assessing the ability for value creation. Analytical mindset with a very strong numerical ability. Eye for detail without losing the strategic overview. Team player that communicates easily with all relevant stakeholders. Cooperation with other departments and disciplines within the organization is second nature, especially when solving complex problems. Broad experience in relationship management of clients and investee companies. Large network of contacts at major/boutique investment banks. Graduated from Erasmus University and CFA charterholder.
